name: Romantic Dinner Cruise
description:
Goa, the ‘Party Capital’ of India is most oftenly known for its groovy and vibrant beaches. At times, these playful beaches can give you thousands of reason to admire their liveliness. This dinner trip is one amongst these kaleidoscopic reasons.

While setting the sails of the yacht for a spectacular sunset view, the visitors can also opt for this quixotic dinner trip. Especially designed for the couples, every bit of this trip will fill the evening with love, care and the warmth of an endearing relation.
